entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to a few flurries late this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
